snippet: Data were stolen in June from a messaging service used by the department’s employees, including email addresses and phone numbers for about 800 contacts.
abstract: National Crime Agency of Britain arrests 23-year-old British man in connection with cyberattack on message service used by United States Defense Department.
lead_paragraph: Data were stolen in June from a messaging service used by the department’s employees, including email addresses and phone numbers for about 800 contacts.

headline.main: Briton Arrested Over Cyberattack on U.S. Defense Department

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
